articles.title: Court stays release of Vivek Agnihotri's The Kashmir Files - India Today
articles.description: A district court has ordered a stay on Vivek Agnihotri’s film, The Kashmir Files, which was slated to release on March 11. The decision was made after martyred Squadron Leader Ravi Khanna’s wife filed a complaint.
